message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. What do you think?
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $950000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can see you're willing to pay a premium for it. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $990000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above your counteroffer. I'm willing to pay $980000 for the product. Would you be willing to accept that price?
